verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6293>met<s%> him.

And <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H4264>host:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4266>Mahanaim.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall ye <S%H559>speak<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> I have <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and stayed <S%H309>there<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> now: <S%H6258><s%>

And I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7794>oxen,<s%> and <S%H2543>asses,<s%> <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>womenservants:<s%> and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> he <S%H1980>cometh<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was greatly <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H3334>distressed:<s%> and he <S%H2673>divided<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> him, and the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>bands;<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4264>company,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> it, then the other <S%H4264>company<s%> which is <S%H7604>left<s%> shall <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H559>saidst<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto thy <S%H776>country,<s%> and to thy <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and I will deal <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee:

I am not <S%H6994>worthy<s%> of the least of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H2617>mercies,<s%> and of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> with my <S%H4731>staff<s%> I passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> I am <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>bands.<s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of my <S%H251>brother,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, <S%H6435>lest<s%> he will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> me, and the <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H559>saidst,<s%> I will surely do thee <S%H3190>good,<s%> <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5973><s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H4480>multitude.<s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And he <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night;<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> that which <S%H935>came<s%> to his <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> for <S%H6215>Esau<s%> his <S%H251>brother;<s%>
Two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> she <S%H5795>goats,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> he <S%H8495>goats,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7353>ewes,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%>

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> <S%H3243>milch<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> with their <S%H1121>colts,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H6510>kine,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> she <S%H860>asses,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5895>foals.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> every <S%H5739>drove<s%> <S%H5739><s%> by <S%H905>themselves;<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> Pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7305>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5739>drove<s%> and <S%H5739>drove.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7223>foremost,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6298>meeteth<s%> thee, and <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Whose<s%> art <S%H859>thou?<s%> and <S%H575>whither<s%> <S%H1980>goest<s%> thou? and <S%H4310>whose<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee?

Then thou shalt <S%H559>say,<s%> They be thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> us.

And <S%H1571>so<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H5739>droves,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> On <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> shall ye <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> when ye <S%H4672>find<s%> him.

And <S%H559>say<s%> ye <S%H1571>moreover,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> us. <S%H3588>For<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3722>appease<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with the <S%H4503>present<s%> that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> he will <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of me.

So <S%H5674>went<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> over <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him: and <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H4264>company.<s%>

And he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>womenservants,<s%> and his <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3206>sons,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4569>ford<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok.<s%>
And he <S%H3947>took<s%> them, and sent them <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and sent <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> and there <S%H79>wrestled<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H5927>breaking<s%> of the <S%H7837>day.<s%>

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> against him, he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of his <S%H3409>thigh;<s%> and the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%> was out of <S%H3363>joint,<s%> as he <S%H79>wrestled<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7837>day<s%> <S%H5927>breaketh.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> let thee <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H1288>bless<s%> me.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>What<s%> is thy <S%H8034>name?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> as a prince hast thou <S%H8280>power<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and hast <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> is <S%H2088>it<s%> that thou dost <S%H7592>ask<s%> after my <S%H8034>name?<s%> And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6439>Peniel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> and my <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H5337>preserved.<s%>

And <S%H834>as<s%> he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rose<s%> upon him, and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6760>halted<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> which <S%H5384>shrank,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of the <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%> in the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> that <S%H5384>shrank.<s%>
